description: A custom ping, sending time is fully controlled by the application.
name: custom

metrics.name: errors.marian
metrics.description: Marian code related error.

metrics.name: errors.memory
metrics.description: Memory allocation error.

metrics.name: errors.model_download
metrics.description: Failed to download a model for a supported language pair.

metrics.name: errors.translation
metrics.description: The translation procedure has failed.

metrics.name: infobar.change_lang
metrics.description: "This page is in" language was changed manually.

metrics.name: infobar.closed
metrics.description: The translation infobar was closed.

metrics.name: infobar.displayed
metrics.description: The translation infobar was automatically displayed in a browser.

metrics.name: infobar.never_translate_lang
metrics.description: "Never translate language" button in the infobar options was pressed.

metrics.name: infobar.never_translate_site
metrics.description: "Never translate site" button in the infobar options was pressed.

metrics.name: infobar.not_now
metrics.description: "Not now" button on the infobar was pressed.

metrics.name: infobar.translate
metrics.description: The "Translate" button was pressed on translation infobar.

metrics.name: metadata.firefox_client_id
metrics.description: Firefox Telemetry client id.

metrics.name: metadata.from_lang
metrics.description: Translation source language.

metrics.name: metadata.to_lang
metrics.description: Translation target language.

metrics.name: performance.model_download_time
metrics.description: Time spent on downloading a translation model for a language pair (ms).

metrics.name: performance.model_load_time
metrics.description: Time spent on loading a model into memory to start translation (ms).

metrics.name: performance.translation_quality
metrics.description: Quality estimation of translation.

metrics.name: performance.translation_time
metrics.description: Time spent on web page translation (ms).

metrics.name: performance.words_per_second
metrics.description: Speed of translation.

metrics.name: service.lang_mismatch
metrics.description: The user and website languages do not match.

metrics.name: service.not_supported
metrics.description: Language pair of user and website languages is not supported.

metrics.name: service.not_suppported
metrics.description: Language pair of user and website languages is not supported.

metrics.name: test.counter_test
metrics.description: Test counter.

metrics.name: test.event_test
metrics.description: Test event.

metrics.name: test.string_test
metrics.description: Test string.

metrics.name: app_build
metrics.description:
The build identifier generated by the CI system (e.g. "1234/A").
For language bindings that provide automatic detection for this value,
(e.g. Android/Kotlin), in the unlikely event that the build identifier
can not be retrieved from the OS, it is set to "inaccessible". For other
language bindings, if the value was not provided through configuration,
this metric gets set to `Unknown`.

metrics.name: app_channel
metrics.description: The channel the application is being distributed on.

metrics.name: app_display_version
metrics.description:
The user visible version string (e.g. "1.0.3").
In the unlikely event that the display version can not be retrieved,
it is set to "inaccessible".

metrics.name: architecture
metrics.description: The architecture of the device, (e.g. "arm", "x86").

metrics.name: client_id
metrics.description: A UUID uniquely identifying the client.

metrics.name: device_manufacturer
metrics.description:
The manufacturer of the device the application is running on.
Not set if the device manufacturer can't be determined (e.g. on Desktop).

metrics.name: device_model
metrics.description:
The model of the device the application is running on.
On Android, this is Build.MODEL, the user-visible marketing name,
like "Pixel 2 XL".
Not set if the device model can't be determined (e.g. on Desktop).

metrics.name: first_run_date
metrics.description: The date of the first run of the application.

metrics.name: locale
metrics.description:
The locale of the application during initialization (e.g. "es-ES").
If the locale can't be determined on the system, the value is
["und"](https://unicode.org/reports/tr35/#Unknown_or_Invalid_Identifiers),
to indicate "undetermined".

metrics.name: os
metrics.description:
The name of the operating system.
Possible values:
Android, iOS, Linux, Darwin, Windows,
FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, Solaris, unknown

metrics.name: os_version
metrics.description:
The user-visible version of the operating system (e.g. "1.2.3"). If the
version detection fails, this metric gets set to `Unknown`.
